Blazing Saddles

Rank: 89


In order to ruin a western town and steal their land- a corrupt politician appoints a black sheriff- who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.


Director: Mel Brooks

Writer: Mel Brooks, Norman Steinberg, Andrew Bergman

Stars: Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens

Tags: Dark Comedy, Farce, Parody, Slapstick, Comedy, Western
